chat.msg: Welcome!

go to the tiger island, go down between the parrot and elephant on the next island, cross east over the rocks and travel south under the frog, then circle back west across the alligator and cross the other rock path to the giraffe and head south towards the snake. the treasure is due east of the snake

I see the tiger island to my left. Heading there now. 
I've reached the tiger island. I see the butterfly island to the southeast and the big island with the parrot to the southwest. Which way should I go?
to the big island

Alright, I will head southwest towards the big island with the parrot.
I've arrived at the big island with the parrot. I see the elephant to the left. Which direction should I go now?
go south between the parrot and elephant on the next island, cross east over the rocks

Okay, I will head south between the parrot and elephant on the next island, and then cross east over the rocks.
I've crossed east over the rocks. What's the next step?
circle back west across the alligator and cross the other rock path to the giraffe

Got it, I will circle back west across the alligator and cross the other rock path to the giraffe.
I have reached the giraffe. Which direction should I go now?
south

Okay, I will head south from the giraffe. 
I've reached the next location. Please provide the next instruction.
head east for the treasure

Great! I will head east from my current location in search of the treasure.
I have found the treasure! *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello what is your goal?
Hello! My goal is to guide you through a path on the map. Are you ready to start?
yes, where should i go first?
Great! Let's start by taking a few steps to the left (west). Can you describe what you see around you?
i see a park bench and a flower stand
Wonderful! Now, I want you to make a U-turn to your left and cross the trail again. What do you see next?
a park bench
Great! Just near the park bench, you will see a wooden branch crossing a river. Can you find it?
yes
Perfect! Step 2: I want you to go over the wooden branch and continue heading south. As you move, describe what you see around you.
i see fish in the stream a dog, and a picnic
Fantastic! Now, step 3: Go over the picnic mat and touch a bowl of berries. Then continue moving towards the west. Keep me updated on what you come across!
I see 2 logs crossing the stream one to the left of fish and one to the right of them
Interesting! Step 4: Cross over the log that is to the left of the fish and continue to the north. Let me know what you see on the other side of the river!
I see a deer on the right and people on bench on left
Wonderful! Step 5: Instead of touching the green bush, I want you to circle it from the right. Keep going until you reach the florist stand. Let me know when you're there!
ok

Great job! Step 6: Turn left (west) and go below the florist stand. You will soon come across a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Keep moving west past the bridge. Let me know when you've passed it!
i'm passed it
Excellent! Step 7: Just past the bridge, you should see two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. What do you see next?
a veggie stand
Almost there! Step 8: Move a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch. What do you see on the other side of the branch?
a deer
Great! Step 9: Now, continue east, between the wooden branch and the green bush. Keep moving and let me know what you see further east!
a couple rocks?

Good observation! Step 10: Just a few steps east from the rocks, you will find a brown young deer. Congratulations, you have reached your final objective! Well done, and thank you for playing the game!
ok thanks

You're welcome! I hope you enjoyed the game and had fun exploring the map. If you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with, feel free to let me know. Have a great day!
how do I continue

I apologize for any confusion. Since you have reached the final objective, there is no further path to continue for now. If you wish to explore the map further or have any other specific questions or requests, please let me know and I'll be happy to assist you.

chat.msg: Welcome!
head south until you reach the trail, then head east

You are at the tent located at the north of the map. I will head south from here. 

Now, I need to find the trail. Could you provide any additional details about the trail's location or any landmarks nearby?
head south along the rocky ridge and you will run into the trail

Got it! I will head south along the rocky ridge until I run into the trail. 

I have reached the trail. Now, you mentioned heading east. Are there any specific landmarks or objects I should be looking out for as I head in that direction?
there's a dog on your left and bbq on your right

Thank you for the instructions! I will head east from the trail.

As I'm heading east, I see a dog sitting on my left and a BBQ on my right. 

Do I continue heading east from here?
head north around the fire until you see a toadstool then south back onto trail

Great! I will head north around the fire from here, keeping it to my right. 

As I continue north, I see a toadstool. 

Should I go south from the toadstool to get back onto the trail?
yes. then travel east until you see a car, then turn around, head west until there's a fork in the trail

Understood! I will go south from the toadstool to get back onto the trail.

Now, I will travel east from the trail. As I continue, I see a car. 

Should I turn around and head west from the car until I reach a fork in the trail?
yes

Great! I will turn around and start heading west from the car.

As I continue west, I reach a fork in the trail.

Which direction should I take at the fork?
south until you see a telescope

Got it! I will take the southern path at the fork and continue south.

As I proceed, I see a blue telescope.

What should I do from here?
travel south off of the trail between the telescope and bush until you reappear on the trail

Understood! I will travel south off the trail, between the telescope and the bush.

As I make my way south, I will keep an eye out for the whereabouts of the trail.

Once I reappear on the trail, what should I do next?
head west

Got it! I have reappeared on the trail and I will now head west.

As I continue west, I see some rocks surrounding a wooden house.

Is this the final destination? *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Welcome to the navigation game. Are you ready to start?
yes
Great! You are currently at the top part of the map near the three palm trees. Take a moment to observe your surroundings and let me know what you see.
I see a dog to the south
That's not quite right. Take another look around and let me know if you see any palm trees nearby.
yes i see the palm trees
Fantastic! Now, starting from the palm trees, I want you to head toward the first tree on your left (southwest). Let me know when you have reached the tree.
ok im there
Great job! Now, facing the first tree, I want you to take a right turn and continue straight until you reach the second palm tree. Let me know when you have arrived there.
ok
Excellent! Now, just before you reach the third tree, make a sharp left turn. This will bring you southward. Let me know when you have made the turn and started heading south.
ok heading south
hello?
Apologies for the delay. I'm here! Great job on heading south. Keep going in that direction for a little while. Let me know if you spot anything interesting along the way.
i'm on the beach and see a dog due east

That's close, but not quite on the right path. From where you made the sharp left turn, you should continue south until you reach a specific landmark. Look around and describe what you see around you.
dog to the east large rocks to the south

Almost there! Just to clarify, you should be seeing a big rock on your left (west) and a small rock on your right (east). Once you are between those rocks, you'll be able to see the ocean. Can you confirm if you are in that location?
yes
Great! Now, facing the ocean, it's time to proceed. Enter the water and keep heading straight. Once you are in the water, let me know so we can continue to the next step.
i'm in the water and see rocks in front of me
Perfect! Now, facing the rocks in front of you, I want you to make a right turn (west) and follow along the big rock. Let me know if you encounter anything interesting as you continue westward.
shark!
Oh no, be careful! Stay calm and make a sharp right turn to avoid the shark. Once you've made the turn, let me know what you see around you.
I see a rock and volleyball
Great job avoiding the shark! Now, between the rock and the volleyball, continue on and head back to land. Once you've reached the land, let me know what you see around you.
i see a speaker

Perfect! Now, with the speaker to your right, veer slightly to the left and start heading towards the northwest. As you move in that direction, keep an eye out for any distinctive landmarks or objects. Let me know if you spot anything interesting.
there is a tent

Fantastic! You're on the right track. Pass between the red tent on your left and the larger speaker on your right. After you pass between them, continue northward. Let me know if you encounter any other landmarks along the way.
there's a cliff
Great observation! Just before you reach the cliff, make a slight left turn. This will keep you on the right path. As you continue north, let me know if you notice anything else interesting.
move cliff and small rocks
Apologies for the confusion earlier. Let's focus on the immediate surroundings. As you continue northward, you should come across a red kayak. Once you reach it, let me know.
i had to travel south to reach the kayak but i'm there now

My apologies for the confusion. You're doing great! Now, facing the kayak, take a 90-degree turn to your right (north) and start moving along the kayak. Let me know what you see as you follow the path.
bush and rocks?

Great job! As you move along the kayak, you should come across a small green bush. Once you reach the bush, you've completed the path successfully! Congratulations! Take a moment to celebrate your achievement. Well done!

general_survey.answer: I don't really think anything. that's just how they communicate.

general_survey.answer: just plain English speaker, that's all :)
